name: Stay warm (Anibulus)
description:
This game has been made for the Winter Break GameJam  with  the theme "STAY WARM"

You play as Jorgito el Cuadradito. He is alone in the enviroment and the only thing he can do is move around... but maybe together he could be able to do something better.

Find and collect friends who go along with Jorgito to unlock actions, and allow everyone to resist the cold longer. But be careful with the obstacles, keep as many friends as you can. 

AD - Move

Space - Jump

Shift - Break   

There exists 4 types of pals.

-Blue, let you jump but get stuck on the snow

-Red, let you break but strong wind throw them

-Black, hug everyone on strong winds but it sinks on the water

-Yellow, protect everyone on the storms but it will not come back

>Be carefull with the sewers, or you are going to lose every pal

> Storm if you dont have yellow pal is instakill
